name: Fat Ninja
description:
You're a ninja, Harry! And a rather fat one as well! You have snuck into the holy food temple, the home of delicious and fattening foods, however some may describe this place as a zone of danger. Beware your step as your own puffy weight can bring the whole level down! However, remember that since you're a rather large fellow, you have a large and demanding appetite and ninja is hungry work! So with all this food around, it should be obvious what you should do!

We highly recommend a gamepad for this game, however if you're adamant to use the keyboard, we suggest tapping buttons instead of holding them.
